jobDescription: Responsible for ensuring safety, performing routine jobs in SAP, preparing reports, understanding safety procedures and standards, performing shift jobs, and possessing domain technical skills, problem-solving abilities, attention to detail, creativity, logical thinking, quality focus, design skills, project management skills, supplies management skills, and strong communication skills.
requiredSkills: Design Skills with knowledge of Design tools relevant to domain
MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook and Word)
Business communication, presentation and interpersonal skills
SAP (MM as well as PM module)
benefitsOffered: Insurances including Group Medical Coverage Insurance (GMC)
Mobile Phone and Data Card/Broadband reimbursement
